channel.title: Healers United
channel.description: An Everquest guild on the Quellious server. Serving the citizens of Norrath with the gift of life.
channel.dc:creator: loral@healersunited.com

item.title: Juror reaches 65!
item.description: A belated congratulations to Juror for reaching level 65!...
item.p: A belated congratulations to Juror for reaching level 65!

body.p: A belated congratulations to Juror for reaching level 65!

item.title: Wanna Rez?
item.description: Congratulations to Brubel who after living for weeks in Skyfire hunting shards finally put an end to the red dragon and got his fancy beer err water sprinkler! Rangers everywhere are rejoicing =)...
item.p: Congratulations to Brubel who after living for weeks in Skyfire hunting shards finally put an end to the red dragon and got his fancy beer err water sprinkler!
Rangers everywhere are rejoicing =)

body.p: Congratulations to Brubel who after living for weeks in Skyfire hunting shards finally put an end to the red dragon and got his fancy beer err water sprinkler!
Rangers everywhere are rejoicing =)

item.title: Criket Reaches 65
item.description: WTG Criket on attaining the level of 65! You and Nightshade look really healthy to me. Not sure what group meant when they said Beastlords get sick at 65. *grins*...
item.p: WTG Criket on attaining the level of 65!

You and Nightshade look really healthy to me. Not sure what group meant when they said Beastlords get sick at 65.
*grins*

body.p: WTG Criket on attaining the level of 65!

You and Nightshade look really healthy to me. Not sure what group meant when they said Beastlords get sick at 65.
*grins*

item.title: Ketre and Stonehewer
item.description: Huzzah to High Priestess Ketre and Lord Protector Stonehewer! Quite a beautiful sound, isn't it...

item.title: Spells for Guildies
item.description: Full members of Healers United are able to view our current list of spells in the guild library. If there are great magics you require within this list, contact Deeme....
item.p: Full members of Healers United are able to view our current list of spells in the guild library. If there are great magics you require within this list, contact Deeme.

body.p: Full members of Healers United are able to view our current list of spells in the guild library. If there are great magics you require within this list, contact Deeme.

item.title: New Positions
item.description: Proposals to no longer have High Elders, to adjust duties of Elders, and to change level and time in guild requirements passed at last night's meeting. Here are the official results of the votes. Based on outcome of vote,...

img.alt: Pirates United. Photo by Elfauna, posted by Loral

item.p: Proposals to no longer have High Elders, to adjust duties of Elders, and to change level and time in guild requirements passed at last night's meeting. Here are the official results of the votes.
Based on outcome of vote, I have new assignments to announce.

ELDERS
Brubel, cleric
Deeme, druid
Ketre, cleric
Loral, cleric
Podboy, druid
Soulsender, SK

OFFICERS
Auburn, druid
Eniel, ranger
Faffun, druid
Greyfeather, druid
Qazadoo, cleric
Ughlei, shaman
Warrick, shaman
Zoyer, druid

Belgaran as the founder of HU remains on roster as an honorary elder. I also hope to come up with fancy title for former High Elders and Elders who have retired or who I just removed from positions due to inactivity.
Congratulations and welcome new Elders!

img.alt: Pirates United. Photo by Elfauna, posted by Loral

body.p: Proposals to no longer have High Elders, to adjust duties of Elders, and to change level and time in guild requirements passed at last night's meeting. Here are the official results of the votes.
Based on outcome of vote, I have new assignments to announce.

ELDERS
Brubel, cleric
Deeme, druid
Ketre, cleric
Loral, cleric
Podboy, druid
Soulsender, SK

OFFICERS
Auburn, druid
Eniel, ranger
Faffun, druid
Greyfeather, druid
Qazadoo, cleric
Ughlei, shaman
Warrick, shaman
Zoyer, druid

Belgaran as the founder of HU remains on roster as an honorary elder. I also hope to come up with fancy title for former High Elders and Elders who have retired or who I just removed from positions due to inactivity.
Congratulations and welcome new Elders!

item.title: Maestro Trebler
item.description: Yup, he's 65 now. You have come a long way from tavern gigs, Trebler. Congratulations!!!...

p.p: Yup, he's 65 now. You have come a long way from tavern gigs, Trebler. Congratulations!!!
Yup, he's 65 now. You have come a long way from tavern gigs, Trebler. Congratulations!!!

item.title: Officer Eniel
item.description: Having completed officer training program, been recommended for promotion by sponsor, recruitment elder, and guildleader, and received majority of votes from elders, I am pleased to announce the promotion of Eniel, ranger of Tunare, to officer of Healers United. *hands...
item.p: Having completed officer training program, been recommended for promotion by sponsor, recruitment elder, and guildleader, and received majority of votes from elders, I am pleased to announce the promotion of Eniel, ranger of Tunare, to officer of Healers United.
*hands Eniel her first stack of paperwork and a mango*
Congratulations!

body.p: Having completed officer training program, been recommended for promotion by sponsor, recruitment elder, and guildleader, and received majority of votes from elders, I am pleased to announce the promotion of Eniel, ranger of Tunare, to officer of Healers United.
*hands Eniel her first stack of paperwork and a mango*
Congratulations!

item.title: Swiftwinds abound!
item.description: Yup, that's right. Last night (Easter Sunday) three rangers in HU finished quest for Swiftwind after a quick dash into the Hole. WOOHOO! Grats, Llyan! Grats, Adarer! Grats, Eniel! This mean you won't bother shaman as much for haste?...
item.p: Yup, that's right. Last night (Easter Sunday) three rangers in HU finished quest for Swiftwind after a quick dash into the Hole.

WOOHOO!
Grats, Llyan!
Grats, Adarer!
Grats, Eniel!
This mean you won't bother shaman as much for haste?

body.p: Yup, that's right. Last night (Easter Sunday) three rangers in HU finished quest for Swiftwind after a quick dash into the Hole.

WOOHOO!
Grats, Llyan!
Grats, Adarer!
Grats, Eniel!
This mean you won't bother shaman as much for haste?

item.title: Criket and Aarkan receive their epics!
item.description: Congratulations to both Criket for her new treasures, a pair of Claws of the Savage Spirit, and Aarkan for his new possession of Swiftwind!...
item.p: Congratulations to both Criket for her new treasures, a pair of Claws of the Savage Spirit, and Aarkan for his new possession of Swiftwind!

body.p: Congratulations to both Criket for her new treasures, a pair of Claws of the Savage Spirit, and Aarkan for his new possession of Swiftwind!

item.title: New Healers Website
item.description: Today the Healers United website has switched to a new server and has a new overall philosophy for design, application, and maintanance. Read more about the website change. Please let us know what you think and any problems you find....
item.p: Today the Healers United website has switched to a new server and has a new overall philosophy for design, application, and maintanance. Read more about the website change. Please let us know what you think and any problems you find.

body.p: Today the Healers United website has switched to a new server and has a new overall philosophy for design, application, and maintanance. Read more about the website change. Please let us know what you think and any problems you find.

item.title: Ketre's Epic!
item.description: Congratulations to Ketre who finished her quest for the famous water sprinkler last night! Wooohooo! Another epic cleric to rez fallen adventurers... *dances*...
item.p: Congratulations to Ketre who finished her quest for the famous water sprinkler last night! Wooohooo! Another epic cleric to rez fallen adventurers... *dances*

body.p: Congratulations to Ketre who finished her quest for the famous water sprinkler last night! Wooohooo! Another epic cleric to rez fallen adventurers... *dances*

item.title: More Birthdays
item.description: Congratulations to Llyan and Criket (*chirps*) on turning 61! Wooohooo! Frozen toe rum all around.Are you flagged for PoS/PoV? If not, please let me know and I will add you to the "flag needed" list. Loral and I (not sure...
item.p: Congratulations to Llyan and Criket (*chirps*) on turning 61!
Wooohooo! Frozen toe rum all around.Are you flagged for PoS/PoV? If not, please let me know and I will add you to the "flag needed" list.
Loral and I (not sure who else... Rasthik?) have all our spells up to 62 now so if anyone in guild still needs them, we can start turning in ethereal parchments for you.

body.p: Congratulations to Llyan and Criket (*chirps*) on turning 61!
Wooohooo! Frozen toe rum all around.Are you flagged for PoS/PoV? If not, please let me know and I will add you to the "flag needed" list.
Loral and I (not sure who else... Rasthik?) have all our spells up to 62 now so if anyone in guild still needs them, we can start turning in ethereal parchments for you.

item.title: Epic Battles Won!
item.description: Tonight both Broichan and Rasthik completed their epic quests against evil! Broiachan was rewarded with a Nature Walkers Scimitar and Rasthik with a pair of Claws of the Savage Spirit! Click further for a picture of Rasthik's viscious claws....
item.p: Tonight both Broichan and Rasthik completed their epic quests against evil! Broiachan was rewarded with a Nature Walkers Scimitar and Rasthik with a pair of Claws of the Savage Spirit! Click further for a picture of Rasthik's viscious claws.

body.p: Tonight both Broichan and Rasthik completed their epic quests against evil! Broiachan was rewarded with a Nature Walkers Scimitar and Rasthik with a pair of Claws of the Savage Spirit! Click further for a picture of Rasthik's viscious claws.
